name: Harvest Moon: Friends of Mineral Town (Wii)
name_original: Harvest Moon: Friends of Mineral Town (Wii)
description:
As a child, you spent a memorable summer on a farm in the country and
experience a whole new world of excitement. Years have passed, and now
the long-neglected farm that holds fond memories is yours! It is up to
you to successfully rejuvenate the farm and build a life for yourself.
The best part is that you can do it any way you want! Plant and harvest
crops, raise farm animals, marry the woman of your dreams, and start a
family! Take over the reins of life, and create your own pastoral
adventure!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
